      • addConsumerUser

        public java.lang.String addConsumerUser​(int type,
                                        java.lang.String nickname,
                                        java.lang.String id)
        This function adds a Consumer user to the main application. This function builds the Consumer user by parameters given by the user and adds a standard or premium user depending on the type given given by the user.
        Parameters:
        type - int type that differentiates the standard from the premium
        nickname - User's nickname
        id - User's id
        Returns:
        A String validating the operation

      • addAudioFile

        public java.lang.String addAudioFile​(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String authorsId,
                                     java.lang.String url,
                                     java.lang.String duration,
                                     double price,
                                     int genre)
        This function adds an audio file of type Song to the main application
        Parameters:
        name - Song's name
        authorsId - Song's id
        url - Song's url album cover
        duration - Song's duration as a String formatted as hh:mm:ss
        price - Song's price
        genre - Song's genre
        Returns:
        A String with the result of the operation
